characteristics.name: Sense of Humor
characteristics.description: This user consistently uses humor to connect with their audience and diffuse tense situations.

options.description: Their humor is lighthearted and playful, often using wordplay or puns.
Their humor can be dry and sarcastic, sometimes poking fun at themselves or others.

characteristics.name: Music Taste
characteristics.description: This user has a strong affinity for Brazilian music, showcasing their cultural appreciation and enthusiasm.

options.description: They favor traditional Brazilian genres like samba or bossa nova.
They enjoy experimenting with modern electronic elements in Brazilian music.

characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: This user engages in open and empathetic conversations, often using ASMR-like language to build trust.

options.description: They cut through the noise with straightforward honesty.
Their responses are layered with subtlety and emotional intelligence.

characteristics.name: Global Perspective
characteristics.description: This user recognizes the value of diverse perspectives, often seeking reactions from people outside their cultural context.

options.description: They consider a wide range of viewpoints and experiences.
Their focus is primarily on their own cultural background.

characteristics.name: Professional Approach
characteristics.description: This user presents themselves as a professional, using a formal tone and showcasing expertise in their field.

options.description: They adhere to a strict format and use technical terms with precision.
Their content is relaxed and conversational, with an emphasis on building rapport.

characteristics.name: Creative Expression
characteristics.description: This user expresses themselves through creative outlets like music or design, showcasing their artistic side.

options.description: They pour their heart into creating unique and captivating content.
Their creativity is focused on practical applications rather than personal expression.

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: This user values building connections with others, often seeking feedback and engaging in discussions.

options.description: They take the lead in social interactions, initiating conversations and networking.
Their energy is directed inward, focusing on individual pursuits rather than group collaborations.

characteristics.name: Technical Savvy
characteristics.description: This user demonstrates expertise in using digital tools and platforms to create engaging content.

options.description: They wield the latest software and hardware with ease, pushing technological boundaries.
Their technical skills are developing, but they're eager to learn and improve.
